product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and elegant layout for promoting a premium fashion accessory. The background comprises soft, abstract shapes and waves with overlapping tones to create depth and warmth. Central to the layout is an image of a luxurious tote bag (`product_image`) showcased prominently in the middle. Above the product, the top text layer (`heading`) announces the brand or theme in a sleek, geometric sans-serif font, while a subheading (`subheading`) reinforces the product type below it in bold, all-caps text. Toward the bottom, the price (`price`) stands out in a large, bold font, followed by a clear call-to-action button formed by a colored rectangle (`cta_background`) with overlaid label text (`cta`). The overall design is balanced, with a clean hierarchy and spacious layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream (#F2E8DC)
- Sand Beige (#E6D2BE)
- Warm Tan (#D4B79B)
- Muted Gold (#C9A987)
- Deep Brown (#5D4037)
- Soft Cocoa (#8D6E63)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated light brown handbag with gold metallic accents, creating a rich and elegant look. The primary color is a warm camel brown (#B68D78), which exudes timeless class. The texture of the bag subtly enhances the color, giving it depth and sophistication. Gold hardware and charm accessories (#D4AF37) contrast beautifully against the brown, adding a touch of luxury without overpowering the base color. The logo and embellishments use the gold tone strategically, drawing attention to brand prestige. A soft beige or cream background (#F5F5DC) would complement the palette for an advertising banner, enhancing visibility while maintaining elegance.
